title: The Raven Coven
description: Kesta had left her heart across the sea. They were at peace, her people saved from slavery, and yetâ€¦ her soul was uneasy. Chem lies in chaos, its people suffering as a result of the death of the ruling sorcerers. Refugees flee the cursed Borrows, begging for help from those they had made their enemy. A Queen unknowingly makes a dark, deadly pact, and new powers rise to fill the seats left empty by the Dunham necromancers.
author: Emma Miles
